price: „Јоване, прихвати Књигу одлучно!“ А дали смо му мудрост још док је био дечак,
arabic: يَٰيَحۡيَىٰ خُذِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ بِقُوَّةٖۖ وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلۡحُكۡمَ صَبِيّٗا

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yāyaḥyā khudhi al-kitāba biquwwatin waātaynāhu al-ḥuk'ma ṣabiyyan
